"Arche": "Alright, now I want you to get a Blueprint from another ARKS!"
"But, you'll have to go to someone else's Creative Space in order to do that..."
"But sometimes you might feel awkward just entering some random person's place, right?"
"For those occasions, I recommend visiting an Official Creative Space."
"They're Spaces created by my colleagues and I, and are open to the public."
"I'll leave the decision up to you, so head on down to the Teleporter and interact with it to get started, 'kay?"
